players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Charlie was killed. Let's discuss and share any suspicions we have."
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and found out she is the mafioso. We should vote for her to win."
Diana: "Bob, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself immediately and make yourself a target?"
Bob: "I revealed myself because the town needs this information to make the right vote. Diana is the mafioso—let's eliminate her today."

Diana: "Alice seems to have been cut off, but Bob's claim is suspicious. A real detective would know revealing on Day 1 with 3 players left gives mafia a free win tomorrow. He's either lying or throwing."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
